# Executando apenas SVDPlusPlus-020 para Amazon e ML20M devido ao tempo de execução (remover um # para voltar à configuração para Bookcrossing e Jester
../MyMediaLite-3.11/bin/rating_prediction --prediction-file=<BD>/constituent/F<TRAIN>-<TEST>/BiasedMatrixFactorization-020.tsv --prediction-header=user\titem\tprediction --training-file=<BD>/BD/Sample<TRAIN>.train --test-file=<BD>/BD/Sample<TEST>.test --recommender=BiasedMatrixFactorization --recommender-options="num_factors=020" > <OUT>BiasedMatrixFactorization-020-F<TRAIN>-<TEST>.out
../MyMediaLite-3.11/bin/rating_prediction --prediction-file=<BD>/constituent/F<TRAIN>-<TEST>/BiasedMatrixFactorization-040.tsv --prediction-header=user\titem\tprediction --training-file=<BD>/BD/Sample<TRAIN>.train --test-file=<BD>/BD/Sample<TEST>.test --recommender=BiasedMatrixFactorization --recommender-options="num_factors=040" > <OUT>BiasedMatrixFactorization-040-F<TRAIN>-<TEST>.out

../MyMediaLite-3.11/bin/rating_prediction --prediction-file=<BD>/constituent/F<TRAIN>-<TEST>/SlopeOne.tsv --prediction-header=user\titem\tprediction --training-file=<BD>/BD/Sample<TRAIN>.train --test-file=<BD>/BD/Sample<TEST>.test --recommender=SlopeOne  > <OUT>SlopeOne-F<TRAIN>-<TEST>.out
